description:
spec: removed old or invalid TODOs

Several old TODOs are either resolved now (e.g. when is a return
needed), or are from a time the language wasn't frozen (^ for uints
only). Consolidated the others.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=7d87f5bc43b6 ***

spec: removed old or invalid TODOs

Several old TODOs are either resolved now (e.g. when is a return
needed), or are from a time the language wasn't frozen (^ for uints
only). Consolidated the others.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev

https://code.google.com/p/go

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

please ignore - typed 'mail' instead of 'submit'
- gri
